actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide veterans' hospital and medical care to certain members of the armed forces of Poland and Czechoslovakia who were prisoners of war during World War I or World War II.

summary.text: Allows individuals who served during World War I or World War II in the Polish or Czechoslovakian Armed Forces and were made prisoners of war during such service to apply for veterans' hospital, domiciliary, and medical care by a satisfactory showing of such service and prisoner status to the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide veterans' hospital and medical care to certain members of the armed forces of Poland and Czechoslovakia who were prisoners of war during World War I or World War II.
